contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|vivid}} '''Vivid''' may refer to: ==Music== *[[Vivid (band)]], a Japanese rock band *[[Vivid (Living Colour album)|''Vivid'' (Living Colour album)]], 1988 *''[[Vivid: Kissing You, Sparkling, Joyful Smile]]'', a 2008 mini-album also known simply as ''Vivid'', by Korean singer BoA *[[Vivid (Crystal Kay album)|''Vivid'' (Crystal Kay album)]], 2012 *[[Vivid (Electronic song)|"Vivid" (Electronic song)]], 1999 *"Vivid", a song by [[Fairy Fore]] ==Companies== *[[Vivid Entertainment]], a company that produces and distributes adult media *[[Vivid Imaginations]], a UK toy company ==Other uses== *[[Vivid (media arts)]], a media art centre in Birmingham, England *Vivid, a brand of bleach produced by [[Reckitt Benckiser]] *''[[Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha ViVid]]'', a manga in the ''Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha'' series *[[HTC Vivid]], a mobile phone *[[HMS Vivid|HMS ''Vivid'']] * [[Vivid Sydney]], an outdoor festival in Sydney, Australia {{disambiguation}}
